summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple backend and frontend changes (migration logic, user profiles, and extensive UI/hooks adjustments), which are therefore unrequested relative to the provided BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend migration module that drops/removes prior voice model and conversion job data by returning an empty new actor state.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so adding migration behavior is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified backend to include access control + storage mixins and implemented user profile storage and APIs (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) with authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so adding user profile endpoints and auth-gated behavior is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend UI work for voice models and conversion jobs flows (upload forms, selection, jobs table/cards) including progress UI and error/success alerts.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so implementing/adjusting these UI components is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Stubbed React Query hooks for voice models and conversion jobs to return empty data / throw 'unavailable' errors until backend is restored.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so altering data hooks to stub behavior is unrequested.
